thread.title: One of the best days out I've ever had in London
thread.title_full: One of the best days out I've ever had in London - Review of The Kensington, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: LottieLuLuHereford
title: One of the best days out I've ever had in London
text: My Mum and I visited to attend the Tale as Old as Time afternoon tea. The hotel is absolutely stunning. The staff made us feel so welcome, especially George who greeted us. The afternoon tea itself exceeded my expectations. When I asked for vegetarian alternatives they were so accommodating and the food I received was delicious. Barbara was very helpful and enthusiastic throughout our dining experience. Shall definitely be returning in the future.
